ygData.subject: RE: Great post on item balancing (Long)
ygData.msgSnippet: You have an extra SWA rotting away in the bank?    Have you gotten too many blows to the head that you have forgotten? Or is it because you don t have
ygData.messageBody:
You have an extra SWA rotting away in the bank? <cough> Have you gotten
too many blows to the head that you have forgotten? Or is it because you
don't have that nice head piece you wanted so badly a couple months ago
<grins> to protect your noggin?

I'd sure like to try that axe and see if it's better than my St-o-Wr. Esp
dual wielded with the Staff instead of my Dirk.

There's a Tier'Dal Rapier thing that bards can wield but mine is rotting in
the bank.

Sylly Songsynger
<Spirit of the Moon>
Bard of the 37th song
somewhere on Innoruuk


-----Original Message-----
From: Ryan Honeyman [mailto:honeyman@...]
Sent: Monday, November 29, 1999 3:09 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Great post on item balancing
(Long)

From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>

> isn't possible at my level. There are no good weapons
dropped that a group
> of my level could get that a bard can use that are better
than my dirk.
> Hmmm, maybe the dirk is the unbalanced part!


I'm telling you, put on a pretty face and beg in
permafrost =)

I always had a soft spot for mini Harmonics running
around, as
I too am a old hoot who remembers the hardships of those
days.
I have a silvery war axe and another crystalline blade in
the
bank, along with my old steel and charred. You should
start
over on Innoruuk. <g>

Harmonic.
